TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlMembersMapping extends System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping

summary.span: 提供 .NET Framework Web 服務方法與針對 SOAP Web 服務所定義之 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 訊息之間的對應。

span.span: Provides mappings between .NET Framework Web service methods and Web Services Description Language (WSDL) messages that are defined for SOAP Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別不會直接使用。The class is not used directly. 相反地，它會使用：Instead, it is used: - Wsdl.exe 工具或類別，從 WSDL 文件產生用戶端 proxy 類別或抽象伺服器類別時。By the Wsdl.exe tool, or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a WSDL document. WSDL 文件指定的 SOAP 通訊協定的使用。The WSDL document specifies use of the SOAP protocol. - 初始化當.NET Framework 正在初始化 SOAP Web 服務或用戶端物件。To initialize objects while the .NET Framework is initializing a SOAP Web service or client. - 由類別建立時從識別為 SOAP Web 服務類別的物件。By the class while creating objects from classes that are identified as SOAP Web services. 類別的替代方案Web 服務方法與訊息之間的對應的類別。The class is a substitute for the class for mapping between Web service methods and messages. 它用來包含任何下列的實體屬於 SOAP Web 服務方法：It is used to contain any of the following entities belonging to a SOAP Web service method: - 輸入的參數。Input parameters. - 輸出參數和傳回值。Output parameters and return value. - 要求 SOAP 標頭。Request SOAP headers. - 回應 SOAP 標頭。Response SOAP headers. 具體而言，此類別代表對應 WSDL 訊息定義，請根據下列選項：Specifically, the class represents mappings for a WSDL message definition, according to the following choices: - Web 服務方法使用 SOAP 編碼： 最上層和與父代，包裝函式項目有關的屬性，則為訊息部分都由陣列的成員。For a Web service method that uses SOAP encoding: The top-level and properties pertain to a parent, wrapper element; the message parts are represented by array members. 不過，在極少數的情況下，如果 Web 服務作業會使用與.NET Framework 方法再加上 SOAP 編碼，最上層的包裝繫結結合的文件樣式和屬性適用於單一**一部分**產生的 WSDL 文件中出現的項目。However, in the rare case when the Web service operation uses document style combined with a wrapped binding to a .NET Framework method plus SOAP encoding, the top-level and properties pertain to the single **part** element that appears in a generated WSDL document. - Web 服務方法，可讓常值使用的 XML 結構描述定義： 如果 Web 服務訊息或作業會使用包裝的繫結至.NET Framework 方法或只是在定義單一訊息部分，最上層和屬性屬於組件。For a Web service method that makes literal use of XML Schema definitions: If a Web service message or operation uses a wrapped binding to a .NET Framework method or merely defines a single message part, the top-level and properties pertain to the part. 如果有多個部分 （非典型的情況），最上層和與父代，包裝函式項目有關的屬性; 組件由和索引的陣列存取屬性。If there are multiple parts (the atypical case), the top-level and properties pertain to a parent, wrapper element; the parts are represented by the and indexed array access properties. 此外，XSD`any`項目收到特殊處理。In addition, the XSD `any` element receives special treatment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得屬於 SOAP 訊息所對應之 Web 服務方法的 .NET Framework 程式碼實體數目。

span.span: Gets the number of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method to which a SOAP message is being mapped.
The number of mappings in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可能會包含下列任何一項：The collection can contain of any of the following: - Web 服務方法的輸入的參數。Web service method input parameters. - Web 服務方法輸出參數，加上 1 的傳回型別，如果不是 void。Web service method output parameters, plus 1 for the return type, if not void. - SOAP 標頭輸入。SOAP input headers. - SOAP 輸出標頭。SOAP output headers. 請參閱類別有關的條件，這些實體轉譯為`part`Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中的項目。See the class for the conditions under which these entities translate to `part` elements in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As XmlMemberMapping

span.span: The index of the mapping to return.

summary.span: 取得項目，其中含有屬於對應至 SOAP 訊息之 Web 服務方法的 .NET Framework 程式碼實體的內部型別對應資訊。

span.span: Gets an item that contains internal type mapping information for a .NET Framework code entity that belongs to a Web service method being mapped to a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引的陣列存取運算子類別，取得從陣列中的下列任何一個指定的項目：The indexed array access operator for the class gets a specified entry from an array of any of the following: - Web 服務方法的輸入的參數。Web service method input parameters. - Web 服務方法輸出參數，加上傳回的型別，如果不是 void，位於索引 0。Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index 0. - SOAP 標頭輸入。SOAP input headers. - SOAP 輸出標頭。SOAP output headers. 請參閱類別有關的條件，這些實體轉譯為`part`Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中的項目。See the class for the conditions under which these entities translate to `part` elements in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeName As String
public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 .NET Framework 型別的名稱，此型別會對應至表示 SOAP 訊息之 XML 結構描述項目的資料型別。

span.span: Gets the name of the .NET Framework type being mapped to the data type of an XML Schema element that represents a SOAP message.
The name of the .NET Framework type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中定義的 SOAP 訊息`message`項目。A SOAP message is defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document using the `message` element. 請參閱類別在哪些情況下屬性參考到的額外的父代或包裝函式項目定義的 Web 服務方法 （參數或傳回值） 而不是程式碼實體。See the class for the conditions under which the property refers to a code entity defined in a Web service method (a parameter or return value) instead of to an extra parent or wrapper element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeNamespace As String
public: property System::String ^ TypeNamespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 .NET Framework 型別的命名空間，此型別會對應至表示 SOAP 訊息之 XML 結構描述項目的資料型別。

span.span: Gets the namespace of the .NET Framework type being mapped to the data type of an XML Schema element that represents a SOAP message.

value.span: 對應的 .NET Framework 命名空間。

span.span: The .NET Framework namespace of the mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中定義的 SOAP 訊息`message`項目。A SOAP message is defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document using the `message` element.
